mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (posts_title, posts_content, posts_name, posts_main_category, posts_sub_category, posts_minor_category) VALUES (#{posts_title}, #{posts_content}, #{posts_name}, #{posts_main_category}, #{posts_sub_category}, #{posts_minor_category});
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET posts_title = #{posts_title}, posts_content = #{posts_content} WHERE posts_num = #{posts_num};
